title: Track fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致南北线延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் பாதையில் தவறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service between #Yishun and #Woodlands on the NSL is running normally now.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train service on the NSL has resumed. Additional 5mins travelling time from #Yishun to #Woodlands due to earlier fault.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train service on the NSL has resumed. Additional 5mins travelling time between #Yishun and #Woodlands due to earlier fault.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train service on the NSL has resumed. Additional 10mins travelling time between #Yishun and #Woodlands due to earlier fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between #Yishun and #Woodlands due to a track fault.
